Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add defensive checks and validation to walk-forward backtest

- Add date range validation in __init__ to prevent backwards date ranges
- Add empty training data check before accessing gameDate column
- Add gameDate column existence check in benchmark initialization
- Add gameDate column handling in per-player model training
- Create comprehensive BACKTEST_TROUBLESHOOTING guide

Fixes KeyError: ''gameDate'' when training data is empty or malformed.
Prevents confusing failures with clear error messages about date ranges or missing data.
